display.title: Soul Binder
display.description:
By consuming power and liquid experience, the Soul Binder can convert the type of monsters a Broken Spawner will spawn by binding it with a filled Soul Vial.

To add Experience to the machine, one can use a Fluid Conduit connected to a tank or other source of Liquid XP; alternatively, one can use the Experience Rod to place Experience inside of the machine directly from the player.
